content: Xi Jinping to visit Belgrade on 25th anniversary of US bombing of Chinese Embassy in Yugoslavia

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 24, a large number of workers blocked the entrance of the shantytown renovation project in Fengxian County, Jiangsu Province, demanding their wages because Fengxian Construction Investment had defaulted on the workersâ€™ wages.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 22, Linyi, Shandong, it was revealed online that Dequan Group had collapsed, and investors were unable to withdraw their money. A large number of investors went outside the city government to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 22, near Wantong No. 9 Gas Station in Gaobeidian, Hebei Province, a truck carrying a giant cement pipe suddenly fell and hit a private car while turning, crushing the cab. The driver of the car died on the spot.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: April 23, Kunming, Yunnan. A delivery boy honked his horn while riding a bicycle and frightened an elderly man, who forced him to kneel down and write a letter of guarantee.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 22, Zhou Libo, who had been banned for a year for posting an article on Toutiao mocking Huang E's filial son, posted again after being unbanned, saying that he had no regrets and was proud of what he posted a year ago.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 23, in Pingjiang County, Bazhong, Sichuan, a video showed that several urban management officers forced an old man who was selling vegetables on the roadside into a car, and the old man kept wailing.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"The wind is howling"
April 24, Shanghai. Several citizens were stopped by security guards for wearing the same T-shirts to run in the stadium. The security guards said that wearing the same clothes to gather together needs to be reported in advance.
Then the runners asked another staff member, who said that wearing the same clothes is called "uniform clothing" and needs to be reported. This is the regulation of Huangpu District.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Village cadre was named the most beautiful civil servant after beating someone.
April 24, Lianyungang, Jiangsu. It was revealed online that Fang Baoya, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of Xufeng Town, Guanyun County, and several other cadres beat a disabled person. The attackers were not punished afterwards, and they did not even want to compensate for the medical expenses.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of April 23, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, the owners of the community of Kailan Mingdu in Ronggui gathered together and shouted in unison, "Down with the black property management, give me back my home."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 22, Han Yong, former chairman of the Shaanxi CPPCC, was expelled from the party. The official report first appeared with "not daring to take responsibility for struggle"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On April 24, as the incident fermented, the person involved in Jiangsu Kunshan Gas spoke out again.
He said that he just shared his own natural gas bill and did not expect it to cause such a big response. He did not accept any apology from the company and refused to accept any media interviews.
The gas company only needs to explain the doubling of fees to all citizens, not to just one person.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
April 24, South Sixth Middle Road, Qixian Street, Shenyang. A man had a dispute with a bathhouse and stabbed a service staff member before escaping. He stabbed several more people while escaping.
According to the statistics on the Internet, most of the injured suffered injuries to the neck and face.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 22, Ezhou City, Hubei Province, issued a notice encouraging rural residents to buy houses in the city. It supports those who return to their hometowns to start businesses, migrant workers, new citizens, and young people to pay housing provident funds as flexible employment personnel. After paying a one-time payment of six months' amount, they can apply for housing provident fund loans to purchase commercial housing in the city.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 24, the ancestral hall of Huanggang Village in Futian District, Shenzhen City was to be demolished. The villagers confronted two hundred special police officers at the scene.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Correction: It is not a stadium, but a public running area in Lujiazui Riverside Park.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On April 23, Guangdong Fire Department released a video of Zhaoqing firefighters rescuing foreign friends who had been trapped for many days. However, because the water level in the video was very shallow, netizens mocked and questioned whether it was a show.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: According to Hong Kong 01, on April 24, the Zhuang clan ancestral hall shared by Shuiwei Village and Huanggang Village in Futian District, Shenzhen, Guangdong was forcibly demolished by the village committee. The people who protested the demolition at the scene held banners printed with "Resolutely oppose the demolition of the ancestral hall, defend the ancestral hall and never give in, the forced demolition of the ancestral hall is against the Zhuang clan's moral principles" to protect their rights.

content: Recently, in Yanbian, Jilin, new energy taxi drivers collectively stopped operating and went on strike due to rising charging prices.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, a screenshot of a comment went viral on the Internet. The reason was that a live streamer left a message in a comment section discussing lawyers' salaries, saying that he earned 5,000 yuan a month as a lawyer and needed to rely on live streaming to support himself in Shanghai. This attracted a lot of attention from netizens. Afterwards, the live streamer posted a video saying that he was just joking and that the content he filmed was normal dancing.
On the 24th, it was reported online that the relevant departments issued a notice requiring all law firms to conduct industry self-inspection and strengthen management.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On April 24, Chengmai, Hainan. Some netizens found three children locked in their home, and they had not eaten a single grain of rice for the whole day. The person involved said that the children had not taken a bath, and the floor was full of feces. The youngest child was hungry and picked up the sweet potatoes given by the neighbor the day before. The kind-hearted netizens bought milk and food for the children locked in the house.
It is reported that the children's mother is only 24 years old, and because she works to earn money, she can only come back at midnight every day. Therefore, they can only be locked in the house

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, a Chinese tourist accidentally fell down while taking photos under a popular tree in the Ijen crater in Indonesia, causing a tragedy.
However, ironically, under the discussion of related news, many netizens took the opportunity to post photos of their local travels in the comment area.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On April 23, the German Federal Prosecutor's Office announced the arrest of Guo Jian, assistant to the chief candidate of the German Alternative for Europe election. He was accused of being a staff member of the Chinese intelligence agency and suspected of engaging in espionage activities for China.
Guo Jian's public identity is a democracy activist in exile in Germany. He has been active in the German democracy movement for a long time and served as a director of the German Democratic Front.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: April 22, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Blogger "Ten Years in China" interviewed a Sanhe master. The master said that he was abandoned by his parents when he was young and was picked up from the garbage dump. He left Hunan at the age of 9 and has been to many places. He has been in Shenzhen for four years. Because he has no ID card and household registration, and because of his illness, he cannot work normally. Every day he can only pick up the food that the store can't sell and throw away. During this period, he attempted suicide once, and there are still scars on his arms.
